extraDescription: Specialized professional services on an "as and when required" basis to support the Governance, Policy and Planning Sector (GPP) initiatives to improve and modernize Human Resources (HR) management across the Federal Public Service.
comments: This contract was competitively sourced.For a contract with task authorizations, the realized amount of the contract is contingent on the number of task authorizations issued and may be less than the amount proactively disclosed, dependent on the operational requirements of the department.
